original_title: Yoga for Stress Reduction with Hala Khouri, M.A.
overview: The yoga practices are geared towards teaching you how to shift from a fight-or-flight response into a relaxation response. You will also learn how to release stressful energy from your body and handle life's stressors with grace and ease. Hala's unique knowledge of the mind/body connection and her vast understanding of yoga are seamlessly combined to create a program that will heal the body, mind and spirit.
title: Yoga for Stress Reduction with Hala Khouri, M.A.
